definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather

sentences.english: The artwork layout should be sent to GP merchandiser for approval before making print proof.
sentences.chinese: 包裝設計圖需要在打樣前發給採購部採購員確認。

sentences.english: The purchasing agent rushes around every day to secure materials.
sentences.chinese: 採購員天天爲備料東奔西走。

sentences.english: In this sense , merchandisers bring products and customers together.
sentences.chinese: 在這個意義上說，採購員把產品和客戶聯在一起。

sentences.english: Buyer Xiao Li went to Shanghai to purchase goods and can return to the company today.
sentences.chinese: 採購員小李去上海辦貨，今天就能回公司。

sentences.english: Please submit 2 sets of pre-production samples to GP merchandiser for approval before mass production.
sentences.chinese: 請在批產前提交兩套產前樣品到採購部採購員處確認。

sentences.english: Examples of merchandising businesses and some of the products they sell are shown below.
sentences.chinese: 在這個意義上說，採購員把產品和客戶聯在一起。
